name: My Head On Your Body
description:
You've moved to a new town, into a new house, where the previous resident was murdered. The police never found his head. But it has found you.

My Head on Your Body is a short, psychological horror, visual novel with multiple paths and endings. Explore all of the creepy possibilities.

Features


  • 15-50 minutes
  • Creepy story
  • Scares
  • Unique aesthetic
  • Two endings
  • Multiple achievements
  • Hidden scenes
  • Oppressive music

Best experienced with headphones.
